rom.name: Toejam and Earl

disassembly.block: 00000200 60FE BRA $00000200 *Infinite loop back to itself. Used for unhandled errors.
000003FE 4EBA FF5C JSR $0000035C(pc) (Load VDP Routine) 00000402 4EBA 0E82 JSR $00001286(pc) (Setup Registers Routine) 00000406 4E71 NOP 00000408 4E75 RTS

block.id: When C pressed on game screen

disassembly.block: 0000A4F8 207C 00FFDA8A MOVE.L #$00FFDA8A,A0 *Load address of present identified flags 0000A4FE 4A30 0001 TST.B $00(A0,A0.W) *Test if equal to 0 0000A502 6752 BEQ $0000A556 *Branch if it is (Present not identified) 0000A504 0C03 000C CMP.B #$0C,D3 *Check if the current present (stored in D3) is 0C (Togetherness) 0000A508 661C BNE $0000A526 *Branch if it isn't (skip the renaming routine probably)

0000A526 1003 MOVE.B D3,D0 *Move present number from D3 to D0 0000A528 4880 EXT.W D0 *Extend D0 to word size 0000A52A E540 ASL.W #2,D0 *Bit shift D0 2 to the left 0000A52C 207C 000ABBD2 MOVE.L #$000ABBD2,A0 *Set A0 to point to the present name table 0000A532 2070 0000 MOVE.L $00(A0,D0.W),A0 *?? 0000A536 4241 CLR.W D1 *Set D1 to 0 0000A538 1018 MOVE.B (A0)+,D0 *Move a byte from A0 into D0 and move A0 to the next byte 0000A53A 4880 EXT.W D0 *Extend D0 to a word 0000A53C 48C0 EXT.L D0 *Extend D0 to a long 0000A53E 0680 000085B4 ADD.L #$000085B4,D0 *?? Add 85B4 to D0 ?? Why? 0000A544 33C0 00C00000 MOVE.W D0,$00C00000 *Move D0 to the VRAM data port 0000A54A 5241 ADDQ.W #$1,D1 *Increase our counter in D1 by 1 0000A54C 0C41 000D CMP.W #$000D,D1 *Compare D1 to D (14) 0000A550 6C00 0072 BGE $0000A5C4(pc) *Branch if it is greater (To Unknown Routine 1) 0000A554 60E2 BRA $0000A538 *Loop again from A538 if it isn't

0000A556 4241 CLR.W D1 *Clear D1 0000A558 0C53 003A CMP.W #$003A,(A3) *Compare 3A to the address at A3 (FF91E0) 0000A55C 6606 BNE $0000A564 *Branch to A564 if not equal 0000A55E 4243 CLR.W D3 *Clear D3 0000A560 3683 MOVE.W D3,(A3) *Move D3 (so nothing!) to A3 (FF91E0) 0000A562 6008 BRA $0000A56C *Branch to A56C

0000A5C4 5245 ADDQ.W #$1,D5 *Add 1 to our counter in D5 0000A5C6 45EA 0080 LEA $0080(A2),A2 *Load effective address into A2 0000A5CA 0C45 0002 CMP.W #$0002,D5 *Compare our D5 counter to 2 0000A5CE 6D00 FE4E BLT $0000A41E(pc) *Branch if it is less 0000A5D2 5246 ADDQ.W #$1,D6 *Add 1 to our counter in D6 0000A5D4 0C46 0003 CMP.W #$0003,D6 *Compare it to 3 0000A5D8 6D00 FE42 BLT $0000A41C(pc) *Branch if it is less 0000A5DC 4CEE 0C7C FFE0 MOVEM.L -$0020(A6),D2-D6/A2-A3 *?? 0000A5E2 4E5E UNLK A6 *?? 0000A5E4 4E75 RTS *Return (to 8E10)

0000BB78 207C 00FFA248 MOVE.L #$00FFA248,A0 0000BB7E 4A10 TST.B (A0) *Checks if Toejam is in the game. 0000BB80 6D1C BLT $0000BB9E *Branch if he isn't. 0000BB82 13FC 0001 00FFA2A6 MOVE.B #$01,$00FFA2A6 0000BB8A 13FC 0017 00FFA252 MOVE.B #$17,$00FFA252 *Sets Toejam's health to 17 (23 dec). 0000BB92 10BC 0003 MOVE.B #$03,(A0) *Sets Toejam's lives to 3. 0000BB96 13FC 0003 00FFA24A MOVE.B #$03,$00FFA24A *Sets Toejam's cash to 3. 0000BB9E 4A28 0001 TST.B $0001(A0) *Checks if Earl is in the game 0000BBA2 6D1E BLT $0000BBC2 *Branch if he isn't. 0000BBA4 13FC 0001 00FFA326 MOVE.B #$01,$00FFA326 0000BBAC 13FC 001F 00FFA253 MOVE.B #$1F,$00FFA253 *Sets Earl's health to 1F (31 dec). 0000BBB4 117C 0003 0001 MOVE.B #$03,$0001(A0) *Sets Earl's lives to 3. 0000BBBA 13FC 0003 00FFA24B MOVE.B #$03,$00FFA24B *Sets Earl's cash to 3. 0000BBC2 13FC 00FF 00FFA259 MOVE.B #$FF,$00FFA259 0000BBCA 13FC 00FF 00FFA258 MOVE.B #$FF,$00FFA258 0000BBD2 13FC 00FF 00FFDE50 MOVE.B #$FF,$00FFDE50 0000BBDA 13FC 00FF 00FFDE51 MOVE.B #$FF,$00FFDE51 0000BBE2 4878 0001 PEA $0001 0000BBE6 42A7 CLR.L -(A7) 0000BBE8 4EBA F2AE JSR $0000AE98(pc) 0000BBEC 4878 0001 PEA $0001 0000BBF0 4878 0001 PEA $0001 0000BBF4 4EBA F2A2 JSR $0000AE98(pc) 0000BBF8 42A7 CLR.L -(A7) 0000BBFA 4EBA EE3E JSR $0000AA3A(pc) 0000BBFE 4878 0001 PEA $0001 0000BC02 4EBA EE36 JSR $0000AA3A(pc) 0000BC06 42A7 CLR.L -(A7) 0000BC08 4EBA F0A0 JSR $0000ACAA(pc) 0000BC0C 4878 0001 PEA $0001 0000BC10 4EBA F098 JSR $0000ACAA(pc) 0000BC14 42A7 CLR.L -(A7) 0000BC16 4EBA F7AC JSR $0000B3C4(pc) 0000BC1A 4878 0001 PEA $0001 0000BC1E 4EBA F7A4 JSR $0000B3C4(pc) 0000BC22 4FEF 0028 LEA $0028(A7),A7 0000BC26 4E75 RTS

0001DEA6 2F02 MOVE.L D2,-(A7) 0001DEA8 322F 000A MOVE.W $000A(A7),D1 0001DEAC 0C41 0006 CMP.W #$0006,D1 0001DEB0 6D20 BLT $0001DED2 0001DEB2 4242 CLR.W D2 0001DEB4 3002 MOVE.W D2,D0 0001DEB6 207C 00FFE1EE MOVE.L #$00FFE1EE,A0 0001DEBC 1030 0000 MOVE.B $00(A0,D0.W),D0 0001DEC0 4880 EXT.W D0 0001DEC2 B041 CMP.W D1,D0 0001DEC4 6604 BNE $0001DECA 0001DEC6 7001 MOVEQ #$01,D0 *Unseen 0001DEC8 600A BRA $0001DED4 *Unseen 0001DECA 5242 ADDQ.W #$1,D2 0001DECC 0C42 0004 CMP.W #$0004,D2 0001DED0 6DE2 BLT $0001DEB4 0001DED2 7000 MOVEQ #$00,D0 0001DED4 241F MOVE.L (A7)+,D2 0001DED6 4E75 RTS

00027006 33FC 0100 00A11100 MOVE.W #$0100,$00A11100 *Turn off Z80 0002700E 13FC 0040 00A10009 MOVE.B #$40,$00A10009 00027016 13FC 0000 00A10003 MOVE.B #$00,$00A10003 *Request Low byte from A10003 (Pad1) 0002701E 323C 000A MOVE.W #$000A,D1 *Move A (10) into D1 00027022 51C9 FFFE DBRA D1,$00027022 *Loop until D1 = 0 (short delay to read pad) 00027026 7000 MOVEQ #$00,D0 *Clear out D0 00027028 1039 00A10003 MOVE.B $00A10003,D0 *Move value from A10003 (Pad1) to D0 0002702E E508 LSL.B #2,D0 *Bit shift D0 left 2 bits 00027030 0200 00C0 AND.B #$C0,D0 *And it with C0 00027034 13FC 0040 00A10003 MOVE.B #$40,$00A10003 *Request High byte from A10003 (Pad1) 0002703C 323C 000A MOVE.W #$000A,D1 *Move A (10) into D1 00027040 51C9 FFFE DBRA D1,$00027040 *Loop until D1 = 0 (short delay to read pad) 00027044 1239 00A10003 MOVE.B $00A10003,D1 *Move value from A10003 (Pad1) to D1 0002704A 0201 003F AND.B #$3F,D1 *And it with 3F 0002704E 8001 OR.B D1,D0 *Or them together 00027050 4600 NOT.B D0 *Negate D0 00027052 5539 00A0004A SUBQ.B #$2,$00A0004A 00027058 13F9 00A0004B 00FFE46E MOVE.B $00A0004B,$00FFE46E 00027062 33FC 0000 00A11100 MOVE.W #$0000,$00A11100 *Turn on Z80 0002706A 4E75 RTS

block.note: Next to sort. Perhaps game state switch?

disassembly.block: 000125F6 2246 MOVE.L D6,A1 000125F8 2049 MOVE.L A1,A0 000125FA 5270 2800 ADDQ.W #$1,$28(A0,D0.W) *Adds one 000125FE 3030 2800 MOVE.W #$0001,D0 00012602 0C40 012C CMP.W #$012C,D0 *Checks if it is less than 300 00012606 6F38 BLE $00012640 *Branches if it isn't, starts the sleep routine if it is.

block.id: Sets Toejam and Earl's inventory to empty

disassembly.block: 000142DE 2F0A MOVE.L A2,-(A7) 000142E0 247C 00FFDAC2 MOVE.L #$00FFDAC2,A2 000142E6 4241 CLR.W D1 000142E8 3001 MOVE.W D1,D0 000142EA 15BC 00FF 0000 MOVE.B #$FF,$00(A2,D0.W) * Toejam's inventory 000142F0 15BC 00FF 0010 MOVE.B #$FF,$00(A2,D0.L) * Earl's inventory 000142F6 5241 ADDQ.W #$1,D1 000142F8 0C41 0010 CMP.W #$0010,D1 000142FC 6DEA BLT $000142E8 000142FE 4241 CLR.W D1

block.id: Adds Bonus HiTops to Toejam's inventory, 4 on single player, 2 on 2 player.
Adds Bonus HiTops to Earl's inventory, 4 on single player, 2 on 2 player.
From around this address controls the length of time left for presents

block.note: Unknown then present names in ASCII from ABC42 (14 dec characters each)

rom.additionalNotes:
Offset x9a68 and x9a69 if changed to 60 5C stops presents being used up in the inventory
Offset x7C18 and x7c19 if changed to 4E 71 will show the entire map on all levels
Offset x17c14 and x17c15 control which enemies appear in game
78 00 - Ship Pieces ?? 78 01 - Devils 78 02 - Gerbils 78 03 - Shoppers 78 04 - Crazy Doctors 78 05 - Wahinis 78 06 - Bees 78 07 - Cupids 78 08 - No enemies ?? 78 09 - Mail order boxes 78 0A - Wizards 78 0B - Carrot Men 78 0C - Nerds 78 0D - Lawnmower Men 78 0E - Sharks 78 0F - Chicken Army 78 10 - Boogie Men 78 11 - Viking Women 78 12 - Moles 78 13 - Phantom Ice-Cream Trucks 78 14 - Santa 78 15 - Crazy Doctors ?? 78 16 - Bees ?? 78 17 - Lemonade Stand 78 18 - Hula Tub 78 19 - Causes crash when loading level 2 78 1A - Causes crash when loading level 2 78 1B - Causes crash when loading level 2 78 1C - Causes crash when loading level 2 78 1D - Causes crash when loading level 2 78 1E - Causes crash when loading level 2 78 1F - Causes crash when loading level 2 78 20 - Causes crash when loading level 2
A3830 - A6BA0 - Graphics for map
2C52C - 2E72B - Map tiles
CB4D - CBB6 All for lawnmore guy FD34 - 10639
102ea - 102fc
